QuestData.Title: Report to Exarch Admetius
QuestData.Description: A Hand of Argus soldier is many things: Obedient, brave, intelligent, and above all, honorable. You may yet exhibit some of these traits, $c.$B$BReport to Exarch Admetius at Blood Watch if you are still interested in joining the Hand. He and his subordinates will further train you in the ways of the draenei soldier.$B$BAnd remember this, $n: Honorable people do not always perform honorably. Sometimes they cannot.$B$BYou will find Blood Watch just up this road, to the north.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Exarch Admetius at Blood Watch.
QuestData.RewardText: I had a feeling that you would make it this far, $c. If you are willing to go further, I am willing to teach you...
